name: Chicken Biryani
description: Indulge in the aromatic flavors of Chicken Biryani, a classic Indian dish made with fragrant Basmati rice, tender chicken pieces, and a blend of exotic spices.

name: Classic Burger
description: Satisfy your burger cravings with our Classic Burger, featuring a juicy beef patty topped with cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles, served in a sesame seed bun.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Enjoy the classic taste of Pepperoni Pizza, topped generously with savory pepperoni slices, gooey mozzarella cheese, and tangy tomato sauce.

name: Milk Shake
description: Quench your thirst with our refreshing Milk Shake, made with creamy milk and your choice of flavor, perfect for a delightful treat anytime.

name: Chicken Roasted
description: Indulge in the rich flavors of Chicken Roasted, featuring tender pieces of chicken marinated in aromatic spices and roasted to perfection, served with a side of tangy mint chutney.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: A selection of assorted cheeses served with crackers and fruits.

name: Classic Burger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles, served in a sesame seed bun.

name: Milk Shake
description: Tender chicken strips coated in crispy breadcrumbs, perfect for dipping into your favorite sauces.
